## Source: amazon-inspector (c676b8d3fdeb2773313404ba039b4e2162b5e516e6938db609188c352f319cc8)
The package vue2-amis-custom-widget-pro was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c89e8415af9f8dbfdd133417cf5c8df20d1b0ae019ea348b550506119d21341e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vue2-amis-custom-widget-pro' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
